jtorrent.client

Class ChunkedFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtorrent.client.ChunkedFile

  • public class ChunkedFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class that contains a file being shared by peers, allowing them to read and write the file in chunks. Written in a thread safe manner.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChunkedFile.Pair<L,R>
      Given as a solution on: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4777622/creating-a-list-of-pairs-in-java Not concurrent in itself.

        file - The file itself.

      • neededChunks

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> neededChunks()
        Returns a list of chunks that are still needed of the file.
        Returns:
        Set of SHA-1 chunk hashes that are still need for the file to be complete.
